# pd-radio-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                           | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the radio buttons.           | `boolean` | `false` |
| `error`    | `error`    | Shows error state                                                     | `boolean` | `false` |
| `name`     | `name`     | Name of the radio-group. Used to group radios together                | `string`  | `''`    |
| `readonly` | `readonly` | If `true`, the user cannot modify the value.                          | `boolean` | `false` |
| `value`    | `value`    | Value of the radio-group. Used to set the value of the selected radio | `string`  | `null`  |


## Events

| Event       | Description | Type                  |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `pd-change` |             | `CustomEvent<string>` |
